contact.error_message: An error occurred. Please try again later.

header.title: Let's Connect
header.cta: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or collaboration opportunities.

brand.name: My Portfolio
brand.description: Full-stack developer and machine learning enthusiast showcasing projects and expertise.

about.about_me: I'm a Computer Science student specializing in full-stack development; Machine learning and Data Science enthousiaste. I build end-to-end applications—from intuitive front-end interfaces to robust back-end systems—while designing, training, and deploying machine learning pipelines on real-world data. Comfortable working across the full development cycle, I enjoy turning complex problems into scalable, data-driven solutions using modern frameworks and cloud technologies.

hero.name: I'm
hero.personal: Driven to craft exceptional digital experiences by combining clean, maintainable code with high-impact, innovative solutions.

sectionTitle.prefix: Let's Have a Look at my

projectsList.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projectsList.overview: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills with responsive design, dynamic content, and multilingual support.

challenges.challenge: Creating visually appealing and responsive design
challenges.solution: Used Next.js and Tailwind CSS for modern, scalable components
Implemented dynamic content loading and theme switching mechanisms

outcome.description: Successfully built a modern portfolio website with seamless user experience, multilingual support, and optimized performance.

projectsList.title: Morgan Stanley Code to Give – Athena HopeBridge
projectsList.overview: A fully functional web application developed for Morgan Stanley's Code to Give initiative, integrating AI-driven features with modern web technologies to support the HopeBridge mission.

challenges.challenge: Integrating multiple services and AI features
challenges.solution: Built scalable architecture with FastAPI and coordinated teamwork using Git

challenges.challenge: Meeting stakeholder requirements in time constraints
challenges.solution: Adopted Agile workflow to iterate and gather feedback continuously

outcome.description: Successfully delivered a production-ready web application with integrated AI capabilities, demonstrating full-stack development expertise.

projectsList.title: Picto 360 – Full-Stack Web Application
projectsList.overview: A full-stack web application showcasing optimized performance, clean API contracts, and reusable component architecture recognized by the University of Montreal.

challenges.solution: Optimized state management and restructured components, achieving 30% improvement
Designed and shipped reusable frontend components

outcome.description: Received honorable mention from the Computer Science and Operational Research Department at the University of Montreal for outstanding project work.

projectsList.title: Machine Learning Image Classification Platform
projectsList.overview: A containerized machine learning inference platform deployed on Google Cloud, demonstrating cloud deployment and API management expertise.

challenges.solution: Used Docker and Google Cloud for seamless deployment and scaling
Designed APIs to handle predictions and coordinate frontend-backend communication

outcome.description: Successfully deployed production-ready ML platform with hands-on experience in cloud environments and performance validation.

projectsList.title: MaVille - Java Backend Application
projectsList.overview: A backend system enabling citizens to access real-time roadwork data and submit service requests to the city.

challenges.solution: Implemented data normalization and robust backend business logic
Applied OOP principles, separation of concerns, and maintainable patterns

outcome.description: Delivered a robust backend system with clean architecture and seamless public API integration.

bullets: Support more than 150 students by answering technical questions and explaining concepts in the course Operating Systems (ift2245).
Manage autograding infrastructure using GitHub Classroom and GitHub Actions (CI), including test scripts, submission validation, and troubleshooting failing pipelines.
Grade students assignments and assessments and provide feedback.
Assist students during labs and office hours to clarify course concepts.
Performed over 15 accuracy-critical inventory audits daily with high precision.
Collaborated with multiple teams across the warehouse to ensure inventory reliability.
Applied strong attention to detail and problem-solving skills under operational constraints.
